mapper.select: SELECT s.*, d.department_name FROM Student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.department_no = d.no
mapper.insert: INSERT Student (student_id, student_name, department_no, student_email, student_phone, password, password_question, password_answer) VALUES (#{student_id}, #{student_name}, #{department_no}, #{student_email}, #{student_phone}, #{password}, #{password_question}, #{password_answer})
